item.title: LDW
item.description:
##Â London Data Week

Author: Jen Ding

After a successful London Data Week (LDW) 2023 and 2024, through a partnership with the GLA, LOTI, the Turing Institute, and more, Jen will build up the LDW team of volunteers to further amplify the London data community for LDW25.

item.title: Public AI White paper
item.description:
Contributing to a vision of Public AI

Author: Flynn Devine

A collaboration with partners from Metagov and Chatham House to articulate a vision for Public AI in the 2024 white paper: “Public AI: Infrastructure for the Common Good”
